issues.description: Images must have an alt attribute to provide text alternatives for screen readers.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add alt attribute with descriptive text

issues.message: Color contrast ratio 2.1:1 is below WCAG AA standard (4.5:1)
issues.description: Text color (#cccccc) and background color (#ffffff) have insufficient contrast for readability.
issues.fix_suggestion: Adjust colors to meet contrast requirements

issues.description: Form inputs must have associated labels for screen reader users. Placeholder text is not sufficient.

issues.message: Using div as button - use semantic <button> element
issues.description: Use semantic HTML elements for better accessibility. Screen readers can better identify interactive elements.
The lang attribute helps screen readers pronounce content correctly and search engines understand the language.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add lang attribute to <html> tag (e.g., <html lang="en">)
